sub_title: MSF humanitarian worker - MA student at the University of Amsterdam (UvA) and NIOD Institute studying Holocaust and Genocide studies.
summary:
Experienced Humanitarian Professional | Project Coordination | Operations Support Officer

MA in Genocide and Holocaust | BA in English Translation

Languages: Kurdish, Arabic (Mother tongue), English (Fluent), Turkish, Dutch (Intermediate)

Passionate about making a difference in the lives of vulnerable populations, I bring extensive experience in humanitarian work and project coordination. With a background as a Project Coordinator at Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF) in Turkey and North Syria. My responsibilities included supervising the political and humanitarian situation, overseeing program implementation, and providing detailed reporting to the capital coordination team. I successfully guided teams toward achieving project goals through effective communication and coordination while ensuring compliance with security rules and medical ethics.

Currently serving as an Operations Support Officer since July 2017, I provide essential operational and administrative support to missions managed by the Emergency Support Department (ESD), with a broad range of mission experience in Syria, Turkiye, Armenia, Bangladesh, Ethiopia, Uganda, DRC, Somalia, Sudan, South Sudan Floods Response, Venezuela, Ukraine, Lithuania, and the Netherlands. I have proven my ability to fill critical vacancies, execute administrative tasks, and facilitate smooth operations.

My educational background includes an MA in Genocide and Holocaust from the University of Amsterdam (UvA) and NIOD, as well as a BA in English Translation from Damascus University. These academic pursuits have equipped me with a deep understanding of complex conflict contexts and have enhanced my analytical and research skills.

Fluent in English and with proficiency in Kurdish and Arabic. Turkish and Dutch (intermediate level), I am committed to continuous learning and improving my language skills to a professional level. Effective communication in multiple languages enables me to engage with diverse stakeholders and build strong relationships.

As a humanitarian professional, I am driven by a deep sense of purpose and an unwavering commitment to humanitarian principles. I thrive in challenging and dynamic environments, utilizing my problem-solving skills and adaptability to overcome obstacles and deliver results.

profile_positions.description: The OSO supports the Deputy DirOps and/or Emergency Managers and the Heads of Mission on operational (including resource and administrative) issues and provides input in order to facilitate their decision making toward the development and realization of operational goals.  S/he also facilitates interaction between support processes and the mission with the same goal. Furthermore, the OSO monitors the effectiveness and efficiency of operations, and highlights and responds to problems and constraints as they arise.
profile_positions.title: OPERATIONS SUPPORT OFFICER

profile_positions.description: responsible for MSF operational response in the Project. In close collaboration with the capital team, define and plan the Project objectives and priorities, identifying population’s health and humanitarian needs, analyzing the context and the humanitarian issues at stake, the risks and constraints and calculating human and financial needs. Coordinate, in close collaboration with the Head of Mission, its implementation in order to efficiently ensure the goals as well as to improve targeted population’s health conditions and humanitarian situation
profile_positions.title: PROJECT COORDINATOR

profile_positions.description: The Project Coordinator (PC) delegates ad hoc some responsibilities to the Deputy Project Coordinator according to objective criteria taking into consideration sustainability in the treatment of the different dossiers. In general terms, the Deputy Project Coordinator will assist the PC in planning project’s objectives and priorities, by identifying the population’s health needs, analyzing the context, risks and constraints, and by calculating human and financial resources needed. He/she will contribute to the supervision, monitoring and follow-up together with the PC of all aspects of the projects in order to ensure its efficient and smooth functioning. He/she will replace the Project Coordinator in his/her absence.
